remarks: The multiplication (group power) opereation of the group of integers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-Oct-2017.)  Obsolete version of ~ zringmulg as of 9-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
zrng.1 $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
zrngmulg $p |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( A ( .g ` Z ) B ) = ( A x. B ) ) $.
